intro: Hello, boys and girls. This is your old pal Stinky Wizzleteats. This is a game about a whale. No! This is a game about being happy! That’s right! It’s the Happy, Happy, Joy, Joy Collection!
description:
Hey, man! Ren & Stimpy are back in a collection of games that will satisfy even the sickest little monkeys. Don’t be an eediot – add this to your game library today, you filthy swine!

About This Game
This collection includes the following games:
•	Buckeroo$! (1993, 8-bit & 16-bit)
•	Space Cadet Adventures (1992, handheld)
•	Veediots! (1993, 8-bit & handheld)
•	Fire Dogs (1994, 16-bit)
•	Time Warp (1994, 16-bit)

Hey kids - start jumping up and down like idiots, because look what's new in this collection:
•	Save any where and any time - this helpful feature will allow you to take a litter box break and return right where you left off!
•	Rewind - If you're sucked into the hideous vortex of a black hole, don't fear - you can rewind and try again!
•	Museum Viewer - Nothing could be more fun than viewing original packaging and manuals for each of the included games!
Yes, when it's this much fun - it must be the Ren & Stimpy Happy, Happy, Joy, Joy Collection, from Blammo!
